name: Spellbook: Caster of Cards
description:
Spellbook is a small game about a wizard in a dungeon. Pages of a spell book are replaced by cards, and turns by the sands of time. how far can you descend?


  • Jen Chester- modeling, programming
  • Olivia Zuern- UI, art, programming
  • Isaac Wynzel- Story and card text
  • Matthew Hernandez- Card Silhouettes
  • Gavin Carroll - Audio
